execution_plan.description: Find invoice_numbers that have at least 2 shipments (count shipments per invoice).
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, COUNT(*) AS shipments_count FROM shipments GROUP BY invoice_number HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve invoice dates for the invoice_numbers identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_number IN ($step1.invoice_number);
